data.title: Support
data.desc:
<C1>If you have any questions, feel free to join our<CE> <C2>Discord server<CE> <C1>for consultation, and we will provide you with answers.
Discord server link: <CE><C2>https://discord.gg/SWaH6jBjCU<CE>

data.title: Theme Update
data.desc: <C1>To learn more about the latest updates, please visit our<CE> <C2>Discord server<CE>.

data.title: More Screen Pages
data.desc:
<C1>If you want to add more pages, you can turn on the<CE> <C2>App page<CE> <C1>in the<CE> <C2>klwp global.<CE>
<C1>Path:<CE> <C2>Configs > Initial Settings > App Page<CE>
